Entities.Name: Anatomical Site
Entities.Definition: Vascular anatomical sites associated with lower extremities relevant to PAD diagnosis.

Entities.Name: Disorder
Entities.Definition: Pathological conditions relevant to PAD, including terms related to vessel disease or occlusion.

Entities.Name: Procedure
Entities.Definition: Medical interventions used for PAD treatment or diagnosis.

Entities.Name: Modifier (Severity)
Entities.Definition: Terms indicating severity or degree of disease (used for POS and PROB classification).

Entities.Name: Negation
Entities.Definition: Terms that negate the presence of a finding, indicating the absence of PAD.

Dataset.Name: Mayo Clinic Radiology Notes (PAD)
Dataset.Description: A manually annotated dataset of 455 radiology notes for PAD classification, used to train and evaluate a cTAKES-based NER system.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations used cTAKES with dictionaries created by cardiovascular specialists. Entities needed to form asserted relations (e.g., disorder + anatomical site + modifier) to determine PAD classification. Negation was also detected using cTAKES negation module. Examples include windowed relations and sentence-based matching.
